attributes.additional_details: Asthma can be a fatal illness, which requires alot of treatment. Inhalers every month are costly, especially as prescription costs are set to rise. Often asthma is caused through no fault of our own and can be debilitating. Make prescriptions for asthma sufferers free and help us live with this chronic illness

rejection.details: See petition: Treat Asthmatics the same as those with Diabetes - FREE PRESCRIPTIONS!
